display.title: Acquire: botania:exchange_rod
description: <task task="5F10EB7947E7C1CB" quest="Rod of the Shifting Crust"/>
The Rod of the Shifting Crust is an incredibly useful tool that allows you to swap blocks on a surface with other blocks from your inventory.
Other staffs listed in this chapter allow you to use mana to replace blocks with blocks generated with mana.
<reward reward="2184A7B7B6E41891" quest="Rod of the Shifting Crust"/>
